title: EU’s transport transition stumbles on implementation, not ideas
description: Delaying Europe’s road transport transition would sharply raise costs and undermine the continent’s climate ambitions
content: Road transport has become a stress test for Europes credibility, as efforts to cut emissions enter a decisive phase. Considered the EUs most entrenched climate challenge, it is the only sector where … [+5065 chars]
